Steps to reproduce: 
1. Start Eclipse in a new workspace. 
2. Click on the Servlet wizard toolbar button to invoke the Servlet wizard.

The Servlet wizard does not appear. An error is logged: 

java.lang.IllegalArgumentException: Path for project must have only one segment.
	at org.eclipse.core.runtime.Assert.isLegal(Assert.java:62)
	at org.eclipse.core.internal.resources.WorkspaceRoot.getProject(WorkspaceRoot.java:165)
	at org.eclipse.jem.util.emf.workbench.ProjectUtilities.getProject(ProjectUtilities.java:728)
	at org.eclipse.jst.j2ee.internal.wizard.NewJavaClassWizardPage.addFolderGroup(NewJavaClassWizardPage.java:291)

Thi problem do not happen if there is at least one project in the workspace.
